title: If it's a 4v5, chill the F out
body:
If you join a match and the enemy team is down a person, if it's ranked sure take advantage that's understandable, but don't act like self righteous pieces of trash and just shit talk the enemy team the whole game.

if you do this kind of thing, kicking someone while they're down, then you're a pathetic person in general, doesn't matter that this is just a game, if you act like that at all to anyone then that's a serious character flaw in everything and you need to grow the f*ck up.

That's not quite true. In a simulation, with 100 games played on a 100 player pool, I am getting average win rates between 48% and 52%. I'm not defending IDontLiftICarry, obviously half the player pool is under a 60% win rate. Just saying, the average isn't 50%.

He's talking about server win rate, not individual win rate. 

Example:
If Player 1 wins (1-0), enemy player 2 loses (0-1). 
The next game, player 1 wins (2-0) and say enemy player 3 loses (0-1).
In the third game, player 1 wins again (3-0), and enemy player 4 loses (0-1).

So player 1 (as an individual) has 100% win rate, but everyone else has 0% win rate. Either way, the server has stayed at a 50% win rate, because someone won 3 times, and someone lost 3 times.

But just because someone has a 60% win rate, doesn't mean someone has to have 40%. That would imply the 40% player ONLY played against the 60% player, which isn't likely. Its more logical to assume some players have  1 - 40% win rates, and those massive losses equates to unbalanced (high) win rates for some people.

Well, if you weight the average it will be exactly 50% (unless i'm missing something here).  For example:

Player 1 plays 10 games goes 7-3
Player 2 8 games 5-3
Player 3 12 games 3-9

weighted average = [10 x (7/10) + 8 x (5/8) + 12 x (3/12)]/30 = (7+5+3)/30 = 1/2

Yeah i dont really know what my point is here... its kind of irrelevant but i typed this up so i guess i'll leave it here.

The way it was worded creates some bias.

For example, Player 1 goes 5-0
Player 2 goes 2-4
Player 3 goes 1-4

The combined score is 8-8. The average winrate is around 58%, but the amount of players who have a 50% winrate is only 33%.
